testCases.title: Verify user can navigate to PM Board
steps: Verify PM Board page loads successfully
testCases.expectedResult: PM Board page should be displayed with header and action buttons

testCases.title: Verify PM Board page elements are visible
steps: Verify New Patient button is visible
testCases.expectedResult: All PM Board page elements should be visible

testCases.title: Verify user can create a new patient
steps: Fill in all required patient demographics
Verify patient appears in the list
testCases.expectedResult: New patient should be created successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can search for patients
steps: Enter patient name in search field
testCases.expectedResult: Search should return matching patients

testCases.title: Verify user can filter patients by status
steps: Select a status from status filter dropdown
Verify only patients with selected status are displayed
testCases.expectedResult: Patients should be filtered by selected status

testCases.title: Verify user can edit a patient
steps: Click Edit button on an existing patient
testCases.expectedResult: Patient should be updated successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can delete a patient
steps: Click Delete button on a patient
Verify patient is removed from the list
testCases.expectedResult: Patient should be deleted successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can view patient details
steps: Click View button on a patient
testCases.expectedResult: Patient details should be displayed with all tabs

testCases.title: Verify user can add medical records
testCases.expectedResult: Medical records should be added successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can create treatment plan
testCases.expectedResult: Treatment plan should be created successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can add patient vitals
steps: Add vital signs (BP, HR, Temp, etc.)
testCases.expectedResult: Patient vitals should be added successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can upload documents
testCases.expectedResult: Document should be uploaded successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can add care team members
steps: Click Add Care Team Member button
Verify care team member is added
testCases.expectedResult: Care team member should be added successfully

testCases.title: Verify validation for required fields
testCases.expectedResult: Validation errors should be displayed for required fields

testCases.title: Verify user can filter patients by provider
steps: Select a provider from provider filter dropdown
Verify only patients assigned to selected provider are displayed
testCases.expectedResult: Patients should be filtered by selected provider

testCases.title: Verify user can archive a patient
steps: Click Archive button on a patient
Verify patient status changes to Archived
testCases.expectedResult: Patient should be archived successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can activate an archived patient
steps: Click Activate button on an archived patient
Verify patient status changes to Active
testCases.expectedResult: Patient should be activated successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can refresh patient list
testCases.expectedResult: Patient list should be refreshed successfully

testCases.title: Verify user can clear search filters
testCases.expectedResult: Search filters should be cleared and all patients displayed

testCases.title: Verify user can navigate between patient tabs
steps: Click on each tab (Demographics, Medical History, etc.)
testCases.expectedResult: All patient tabs should be accessible and load correctly
